S04n473:1: asmin khalu punastathāgatāyuṣpramāṇanirdeśe nirdiśyamāne aprameyāṇāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānāmarthaḥ kṛto'bhūt |
S04n473:2: atha khalu bhagavān maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamāmantrayate sma-asmin khalu punarajita tathāgatāyuṣpramāṇanirdeśadharmaparyāye nirdiśyamāne aṣṭaṣaṣṭigaṅgānadīvālukāsamānāṃ bodhisattvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇāmanutpattikadharmakṣāntirutpannā |
S04n473:3: ebhyaḥ sahasraguṇena yeṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ dhāraṇīpratilambho'bhūt |
S04n473:4: anyeṣāṃ ca sāhasrikalokadhātuparamāṇurajaḥsamānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmimaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śrutvā asaṅgapratibhānatāpratilambho'bhūt |
S04n473:5: anyeṣāṃ ca dvisāhasrikalokadhātuparamāṇurajaḥsamānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ koṭīnayutaśatasahasraparivartāyā dhāraṇyāḥ pratilambho'bhūt |
S04n473:6: anye ca trisāhasrikalokadhātuparamāṇurajaḥsamā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śrutvā avaivartyadharmacakraṃ pravartayāmāsuḥ |
S04n473:7: anye ca madhyamakalokadhātuparamāṇurajaḥsamā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śrutvā vimalanirbhāsacakraṃ pravartayāmāsuḥ |
S04n473:8: anye ca kṣudrakalokadhātuparamāṇurajaḥsamā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śrutvā aṣṭajāti[prati]baddhā abhūvan anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau |
S04n473:9: anye ca catuścāturdvīpikā lokadhātuparamāṇurajaḥsamā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śrutvā caturjātipratibaddhā abhūvan anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau |
S04n473:10: anye ca tricāturdvīpikā lokadhātuparamāṇurajaḥsamā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śrutvā trijātipratibaddhā abhūvan anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau |
S04n473:11: anye ca dvicāturdvīpikā lokadhātuparamāṇurajaḥsamā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śrutvā dvijātipratibaddhā abhūvannanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau |
S04n473:12: anye caikacāturdvīpikā lokadhātuparamāṇurajaḥsamā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śrutvā ekajātipratibaddhā abhūvannanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau |
S04n473:13: aṣṭatrisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātuparamāṇurajaḥsamaiśca bodhisattvairmahāsattvairimaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śrutvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittānyutpāditāni ||
S04n473:14: atha samanantaranirdiṣṭe bhagavataiṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ dharmābhisamaye pratiṣṭhāne,
S04n473:16: teṣu ca lokadhātukoṭīnayutaśatasahasreṣu yāni tāni buddhakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇyāgatya ratnavṛkṣamūleṣu siṃhāsanopaviṣṭāni,
S04n473:20: bhagavantaṃ ca śākyamuniṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ taṃ ca bhagavantaṃ prabhūtaratnaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ parinirvṛtaṃ siṃhāsanopaviṣṭamavakiranti sma,
S04n473:23: taṃ ca sarvāvantaṃ bodhisattvagaṇaṃ tāścatasraḥ parṣado'vakiranti sma,
S04n473:29: hārārdhahāramuktāhāramaṇiratnamahāratnāni copariṣṭādvaihāyasamantarīkṣe samantāt savāsu dikṣu pralambanti sma |
S04n473:30: samantācca anarghaprāptasya dhūpasya ghaṭikāsahasrāṇi ratnamayāni svayameva pravicaranti sma |
S04n473:31: ekaikasya ca tathāgatasya ratnamayīṃ chatrāvalīṃ yāvad brahmalokādupari vaihāyasamantarīkṣe bodhisattvā mahāsattvā dhārayāmāsuḥ |
S04n473:32: anena paryāyeṇa sarveṣāṃ teṣāmaprameyāṇāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ buddhakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇāṃ te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ratnamayīṃ chatrāvalīṃ yāvadbrahmalokādupari vaihāyasamantarīkṣe dhārayāmāsuḥ |
S04n473:34: atha khalu maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvastasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata—
S04n473:99: atha khalu bhagavān maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamāmantrayate sma-yairajita asmiṃstathāgatāyuṣpramāṇanirdeśadharmaparyāye nirdiśyamāne sattvairekacittotpādikāpyadhimuktirutpāditā,
S04n473:101: kiyatte kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā puṇyaṃ prasavantīti tacchṛṇu,
S04n473:102: sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru |
S04n473:104: tadyathāpi nāma ajitakaścideva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhikāṅkṣamāṇaḥ pañcasu pāramitāsvaṣṭau kalpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi caret |
S04n473:105: tadyathā dānapāramitāyāṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ virahitaḥ prajñāpāramitayā,
S04n473:106: yena ca ajita kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā imaṃ tathāgatāyuṣpramāṇanirdeśaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śrutvā ekacittotpādikāpyadhimuktirutpāditā abhiśraddadhānatā vā kṛtā,
S04n473:107: asya puṇyābhisaṃskārasya kuśalābhisaṃskārasya asau paurvakaḥ puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ kuśalābhisaṃskāraḥ pañcapāramitāpratisaṃyukto'ṣṭakalpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrapariniṣpannaḥ śatatamīmapi kalāṃ nopayāti,
S04n473:108: sahasratamīmapi śatasahasratamīmapi koṭīśatasahasratamīmapi koṭīnayutasahasratamīmapi koṭīnayutaśatasahasratamīmapi kalāṃ nopayāti,
S04n473:109: saṃkhyāmapi kalāmapi gaṇanāmapi upamāmapi upanisāmapi na kṣamate |
S04n473:110: evaṃrūpeṇa ajita puṇyābhisaṃskāreṇa samanvāgataḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā vivartate'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheriti naitat sthānaṃ vidyate ||
S04n473:111: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata-
S04n473:115: dānaṃ dadanto buddhebhyaḥ śrāvakebhyaḥ punaḥ punaḥ ||18 ||
S04n473:131: styānamiddhaṃ ca varjitvā kalpakoṭyo hi yaścaret ||26 ||
S04n473:134: tena dhyānena so vīraḥ prārthayed bodhimuttamām |
S04n473:136: yacca puṇyaṃ bhavetteṣāṃ niṣevitvā imāṃ kriyām |
S04n473:138: āyuṃ ca mama yo śrutvā strī vāpi puruṣo'pi vā |
S04n473:140: vicikitsāṃ ca varjitvā iñjitā manyitāni ca |
S04n473:143: na te trasanti śrutvedaṃ mama āyuracintiyam ||32 ||
S04n473:151: saṃdhābhāṣyaṃ vijānanti kāṅkṣā teṣāṃ na vidyate ||36 ||
S04n473:152: punaraparamajita ya imaṃ tathāgatāyuṣpramāṇanirdeśaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śrutvā avataredadhimucyeta avagāheta avabudhyeta,
S04n473:154: kaḥ punarvādo ya imamevaṃrūpaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śṛṇuyācchrāvayeta vācayeda dhārayedvā likhedvā likhāpayedvā pustakagataṃ vā satkuryāt,
S04n473:157: yadā ca ajita sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imaṃ tathāgatāyuṣpramāṇanirdeśaṃ dharmaparyāya śrutvā adhyāśayenādhimucyate,
S04n473:158: tadā tasyedamadhyāśayalakṣaṇaṃ veditavyam-yaduta gṛdhrakūṭaparvatagataṃ māṃ dharmaṃ nirdeśayantaṃ drakṣyati bodhisattvagaṇaparivṛtaṃ bodhisattvagaṇapuraskṛtaṃ śrāvakasaṃghamadhyagatam |
S04n473:159: idaṃ ca me buddhakṣetraṃ sahāṃ lokadhātuṃ vaiḍūryamayīṃ samaprastarāṃ drakṣyati suvarṇasūtrāṣṭāpadavinaddhāṃ ratnavṛkṣairvicitritām |
S04n473:160: kūṭāgāraparibhogeṣu ca atra bodhisattvān nivasato drakṣyati |
S04n473:161: idamajita adhyāśayenādhimuktasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā adhyāśayalakṣaṇaṃ veditavyam ||
S04n473:162: api tu khalu punarajita tānapyahamadhyāśayādhimuktān kulaputrān vadāmi,
S04n473:163: ye tathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śrutvā na pratikṣepsyanti uttari cābhyanumodayiṣyanti |
S04n473:165: tatastathāgataṃ soṃ'sena pariharati ya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ pustakagataṃ kṛtvā aṃsena pariharati |
S04n473:166: na me tenājita kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā stūpāḥ kartavyāḥ,
S04n473:170: kṛtā me tena ajita kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā śarīreṣu śarīrapūjā,
S04n473:172: yāvad brahmalokamuccaistvena anupūrvapariṇāhena sacchatraparigrahāḥ savaijayantīkā ghaṇṭāsamudgānuratāḥ,
S04n473:173: teṣāṃ ca śarīrastūpānāṃ vividhāḥ satkārāḥ kṛtā nānāvidhairdivyairmānuṣyakaiḥ puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākāvaijayantībhirvividhama-dhuramanojñapaṭupaṭahadundubhimahādundubhibhirvādyatālaninādarnirghoṣaśabdairnānāvidhaiśca gītanṛtyalāsyaprakārairbahubhiraparimitairbahvaprameyāṇi kalpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi satkāraḥ kṛto bhavati |
S04n473:174: imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ mama parinirvṛtasya dhārayitvā vācayitvā likhitvā prakāśayitvā vihārā api tena ajita kṛtā bhavanti vipulā vistīrṇāḥ |
S04n473:177: te ca bahvaprameyā yaduta śataṃ vā sahasraṃ vā śatasahasraṃ vā koṭī vā koṭīśataṃ vā koṭīsahasraṃ vā koṭiśatasahasraṃ vā koṭīnayutaśatasahasraṃ vā |
S04n473:178: te ca mama saṃmukhaṃ śrāvakasaṃghasya niryātitāḥ,
S04n473:180: ya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ tathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya dhārayedvā vācayedvā deśayedvā likhedvā lekhayedvā,
S04n473:181: tadanenāhamajitaparyāyeṇa evaṃ vadāmi-na me tena parinirvṛtasya dhātustūpāḥ kārayitavyāḥ,
S04n473:183: kaḥ punarvādo'jita ya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ dhārayan dānena vā saṃpādayecchīlena vā kṣāntyā vā vīryeṇa vā dhyānena vā prajñayā vā saṃpādayet,
S04n473:184: bahutaraṃ puṇyābhisaṃskāraṃ sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā prasaved buddhajñānasaṃvartanīyamaprameyamasaṃkhyeyamaparyantam |
S04n473:185: tadyathāpi nāma ajita ākāśa dhāturaparyantaḥ pūrvadakṣiṇapaścimottarādharordhvāsu dikṣu vidikṣu,
S04n473:186: evamaprameyāsaṃkhyeyān sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā puṇyābhisaṃskārān prasaved buddhajñānasaṃvartanīyān ya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ dhārayedvā vācayedvā deśayedvā likhedvā likhāpayedvā |
S04n473:200: yasya kasyacidajita bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ tathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya dhārayataḥ ime evaṃrūpā guṇā bhaveyurye mayā parikīrtitāḥ,
S04n473:201: so'jita kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā evaṃ veditavyaḥ-bodhimaṇḍasaṃprasthito'yaṃ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bodhimabhisaṃboddhuṃ bodhivṛkṣamūlaṃ gacchati |
S04n473:202: yatra ca ajita sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tiṣṭhedvā niṣīdedvā caṃkramedvā,
S04n473:204: tathāgatastūpo'yamiti ca sa vaktavyaḥ sadevakena lokeneti ||
S04n473:205: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata—
S04n473:206: puṇyaskandho aparyanto varṇito me punaḥ punaḥ |
S04n473:215: kṛtā vādyaiśca vastraiśca dundubhībhiḥ punaḥ puna ||41 ||
S04n473:216: madhurā vādyabhāṇḍā ca vāditā teṣu dhātuṣu |
S04n473:218: ya idaṃ dhārayet sūtraṃ kṣayakāli ca deśayet |
S04n473:219: īdṛśī me kṛtā tena vividhā pūjanantikā ||43 ||
S04n473:226: saṃghasya vividhā pūjā kṛtā me tena saṃmukham |
S04n473:228: adhimuktisāro yo syādato bahutaraṃ hi saḥ |
S04n473:229: puṇyaṃ labheta yo etatsūtraṃ vācellikheta vā ||48 ||
S04n473:232: dīpaṃ ca dadyādyo nityaṃ gandhatailasya pūritam |
S04n473:234: kuryādetādṛśīṃ pūjāṃ pustakeṣu ca yo naraḥ |
S04n473:235: bahu prasavate puṇyaṃ pramāṇaṃ yasya no bhavet ||51 ||
S04n473:238: kaḥ punarvādo yaśca syāt kṣānto dāntaḥ samāhitaḥ |
S04n473:241: bhikṣūṇāṃ praṇato nityaṃ nādhimānī na cālasaḥ ||54 ||
S04n473:242: prajñavāṃścaiva dhīraśca praśnaṃ pṛṣṭo na kupyati |
S04n473:243: anulomaṃ ca deśeti kṛpābuddhī ca prāṇiṣu ||55 ||
S04n473:244: ya īdṛśo bhavetkaścid yaḥ sūtraṃ dhārayedidam |
S04n473:252: dṛṣṭvā ca taṃ cintayi tasmi kāle
S04n473:268: iti śrīsaddharmapuṇḍarīke dharmaparyāye puṇyaparyāyaparivarto nāma ṣoḍaśamaḥ ||
